actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to remove the existing limitation on the amount of educational assistance which may be received by certain persons who are entitled to both war orphans' educational assistance and veterans' educational assistance.

summary.text: Removes existing limitations and permits any person entitled to war orphans educational assistance and who uses any or all of such assistance before entering upon active duty to receive veterans' educational assistance as he or she may be entitled to by reason of such duty

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to remove the existing limitation on the amount of educational assistance which may be received by certain persons who are entitled to both war orphans' educational assistance and veterans' educational assistance.
